text: Ageing dog healthcare needs attention! 🐕💉 New research reveals that many dog owners may be missing critical signs of illness in their older dogs, attributing them to normal ageing. 🤷‍♂️🐾 Vets recommend twice-yearly check-ups for seniors, but owners think yearly is enough. 📅👀 A pre-vet checklist could help ID missed signs. 📝💭 Support the BSAVA PetSavers Ageing Canine Toolkit (ACT) to improve care for our furry friends! 🐾💕
